sentences.sContent: A cellist is always shortening and lengthening the strings.
sentences.sContent_eng: A cellist is always shortening and lengthening the strings.
sentences.sCn: 大提琴演奏家总是在压缩或拉长弦

sentences.sContent: The music was also of the highest caliber, including tenor Placido Domingo and cellist Yo-Yo Ma.
sentences.sContent_eng: The music was also of the highest caliber, including tenor Placido Domingo and cellist Yo-Yo Ma.
sentences.sCn: 音乐表演也是一流的，有男高音歌唱家多明戈和大提琴演奏家马友友。

sentences.sContent: Performed consecutively and in order, as they were by the cellist David Finckel and the pianist Wu Han in Alice Tully Hall on Sunday evening, they provide a vivid snapshot of his artistic development.
sentences.sContent_eng: Performed consecutively and in order, as they were by the cellist David Finckel and the pianist Wu Han in Alice Tully Hall on Sunday evening, they provide a vivid snapshot of his artistic development.
sentences.sCn: 上周日晚，在爱丽丝杜利音乐大厅，大提琴家大卫·芬科尔和钢琴家吴涵依次演奏了这五部作品，为听众清晰呈现了贝多芬音乐艺术的发展。
